TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaTable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the metadata that describes a table for use by Dynamic Data pages.

Docs.summary: Gets the column collection for the table.
Docs.value: A collection that contains the columns for the table.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.Columns%2A> property. In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates have been copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. The markup of the Insert.aspx file is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`. In the event handler, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindMetaTable%2A> method is used to find the meta table. The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.Columns%2A> property is used to display the number of columns in the table.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)] -->

For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.

Docs.returns: An object that contains the table metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable CreateTable(class System.Type entityType) cil managed

Docs.param: The table type for which to generate metadata.
Docs.summary: Creates the metadata for the specified table.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the table metadata.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name comes from the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.DataContextType%2A> object that the table belongs to.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the data context that is associated with the table.
Docs.value: The type of the data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.

Docs.summary: Gets the column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.
Docs.value: The column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The column that is returned is selected in this order:
1. The column that is specified by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute> attribute.
2. The first string column that is not in the primary key.
3. The first string column that is in the primary key.
4. The first non-string column that is in the primary key.
5. The first column.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the table in a user-friendly format.
Docs.value: The string that represents the user-friendly name of the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this property defaults to the value of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.Name%2A> property. You can customize the value of this property by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the entity type that represents the table.
Docs.value: The type that represents the entity.

Docs.summary: Gets a comma-separated list of foreign-key names.
Docs.value: A comma-separated list of foreign-key names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The action path is a URL for an action for a specific entity. For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.

For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetDisplayString(object row) cil managed

Docs.param: The row to get the display string for.
Docs.summary: Returns the value to use as the display string for an instance of a row when the row is used in foreign-key relationships.
Docs.returns: The display name for an instance of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the row is `null`, an empty string is returned. If the entity class includes an override of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.ToString%2A> method, the overridden <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.ToString%2A> value is returned. Otherwise, the method returns the `ToString` representation of the value of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.DisplayColumn%2A> property for the specified row.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> GetFilteredColumns() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a list of columns that are filterable.
Docs.returns: A list of columns that are filterable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A column is filterable if it is annotated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute> attribute and the `Enabled` property of the <xref:System.Web.Mvc.FilterAttribute> attribute of the column is set to `true`.

Docs.returns: The instance for the entity type that represents the table in the data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the `context` parameter is `null`, this method creates a new context by calling the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.CreateContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> GetScaffoldColumns (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, System.Web.DynamicData.ContainerType containerType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> GetScaffoldColumns(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, valuetype System.Web.DynamicData.ContainerType containerType) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that indicates whether the table is displayed as an individual entity or as part of a list of entities.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of columns to display by using scaffolding.
Docs.returns: A list of columns to display by using scaffolding.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method returns all columns whose <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ScaffoldColumnAttribute> property is set to `true` except the following:
- Long string columns, which are columns whose <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.IsLongString%2A> property is set to `true` and whose `containerType` parameter is `true`.
- Child columns whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode> value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode.Insert>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable GetTable(class System.Type entityType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the metatable that is associated with the specified type.
Docs.returns: The metatable that is associated with the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.TryGetTable%28System.Type%2CSystem.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable%40%29>. If <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable.TryGetTable%28System.Type%2CSystem.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable%40%29> returns `false`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: The method that was called by this method returned .

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the table has a primary key.
Docs.value: if the table has a primary key; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes data that may not be available when the constructor is called.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.Initialize%2A> method for each column in the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> instance. This method cannot be called directly. To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.Initialize%2A> method. If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method.
## Examples The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.Initialize%2A> method in order to customize the initialization process.
```csharp protected override void Initialize() { base.Initialize(); MyOverridenInit(); } ```
```vb Protected Overloads Overrides Sub Initialize() MyBase.Initialize() MyOverridenInit() End Sub ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks The action path is a URL for an action for a specific entity. For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.PageAction?displayProperty=fullName> class overview.

Docs.summary: Gets the provider for the table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetMetadata() cil managed

Docs.summary: Resets the cached metadata for the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The cached table metadata consists of the information that is obtained from data-model attributes and from metadata about intrinsic columns. The metadata cache is rebuilt the next time any metadata is requested.

Docs.summary: Gets the root type of the entity's inheritance hierarchy.
Docs.value: The root type of the entity's inheritance hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the type is at the top of the inheritance hierarchy or does not have a parent type, the entity type is returned.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the table should be displayed.
Docs.value: if the table should be displayed; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the value that the table is sorted by.
Docs.value: The column that the table is sorted by.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether entries are sorted in descending order when they are used as parents in a foreign-key relationship.
Docs.value: if entries are sorted in descending order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can specify sort order by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute.
